keyMoments.title: Forms Alliance with Franky Family and Galley-La
keyMoments.description: Led by Luffy, the Straw Hat Pirates form an alliance with the Franky Family and Galley-La Company to rescue Robin and Franky from CP9.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' ability to unite former enemies under a common cause, demonstrating their growing influence and Luffy's leadership.

keyMoments.title: Joins Alliance to Rescue Franky
keyMoments.description: Represented by Zambai, the Franky Family agrees to join the alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates and Galley-La Company to rescue their boss Franky from CP9.
keyMoments.significance: The Franky Family, who previously fought against the Straw Hats, now works alongside them for a common goal.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Members Revealed as Traitors
keyMoments.description: Paulie reveals to the other Galley-La foremen that Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno - their trusted colleagues - were actually CP9 agents responsible for the attack on Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation of betrayal motivates the Galley-La members to join the rescue mission and shows the depth of CP9's infiltration.

keyMoments.title: Joins Alliance to Avenge Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Represented by Paulie, the Galley-La Company agrees to join the alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates and Franky Family to pursue CP9 and avenge the attack on Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Former antagonists of the Straw Hats become allies, united by a desire for justice against CP9.
